page.title: 14Housing and home life
page.content:
There is a range of housing- from 19th Century properties to modern homes, but most houses are under 30 years old.Families like their homes and are mostly satisfied with them. From an older house-"We are next to a railway line and as trains pass they make the house quiver." "Near us is a Youth training workshop where they work with metal." From a modern house-"7 people live in my house.It has 4 bedrooms 2 lounges a playroom 2 bathrooms 3 telephones & a large garden.There is an ornamental pool in the garden.
{Sample set of items found in 26 homes. {Colour TV 23 Computer 11 Radio 15 B/W {tv 23 HiFi 18 Video 11 Radio cassette {16 Musical instruments 19. "Both my parents work. My dad works during the day, my mum works at night so it is dad who puts me to bed"
